profile.me: Hi hi! ðŸ‘‹ I'm a fullstack web developer with a preference for frontend development. I love creating interactive and scalable UI; and I welcome you to my portfolio! Here you can get to know the technologies I use and check some of my projects out. Also, you have everything you need in order to get in touch with me.

skills.head: These are some of the technologies I'm most familiar with and those I choose to use in my projects.
skills.body: I love keeping up to date with tech.

projects.head: These are some of the projects I've been working on most recently.
projects.body: Click on any of them to see more.

miNOTE.title: miNOTE
miNOTE.brief: Web app for taking and keeping notes, developed on React functional components. It has a database and an authentification users system based on Firebase. The app feats keyboard shortcuts, a minimalist UI, a favourites section and allows editing on saved notes.

rioba-web.title: Rioba Web
rioba-web.brief: A full responsive web site developed for a local artist. It was my first experience working with code, I used HTML5, SASS as a CSS preprocessor and the Bootstrap library. The site is also optimized for accesibility and search engines.

Outlove.title: Outlove
Outlove.brief: An e-commerce simulator developed with plain Javascript and only CSS. It has a dark/light theme toggler and data persistency through the browser's local storage. It gets the avalaible products data from a URL as a JSON object y posts the orders made by clients to an API hosted on the Pipedreams web service. It includes JS libraries to manage modals and notifications.

Calculadora JS.title: JS Calc
Calculadora JS.brief: A basic operations calculator developed as practice on POO and JS logic. It has a light/dark theme toggler.

portfolio LR.title: portfolio LR
portfolio LR.brief: A multilingual app dsegined to diplay my projects and my skills as a developer. It has theme selection, lenguage selection and gets all of its data asynchronically through JSON and embeds that content on top of the components.

text.title: Thanks for your interest on my profile
text.para: These are some ways you can reach me.
